messages.text: Hi Emily, I wanted to follow up on the proposal we sent last week regarding Marketing Cloud Lite. Let me know if you had a chance to review it — happy to hop on a call to walk through the details. Best
Hi Bruce, I saw it. The price seems high for what you're offering. Not convinced it's what we need right now. – Emily
Thanks for the quick reply. Totally understand — would it help if I sent over a breakdown of how each feature maps to your current challenges? Let me know what's most important to your team and we
Honestly, we're looking at other vendors too. Yours is the priciest. If there's no room to come down, we probably won't proceed. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:45 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce
Appreciate the honesty. There may be flexibility if we can structure a phased rollout. Would you be open to that? Also happy to compare features head-to-head if you'd like. Best, Bruce On Mon, Jul
We don't have time for a long rollout. Either it works out-of-the-box or we're not interested. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:46 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote:
Got it. I'll revise the proposal with a focus on rapid deployment and get back to you by end of day. Let me know if there's anything else I should consider. – Bruce
Send whatever you want, but just FYI — legal won't even look at it unless it's under $90K. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:47 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote: Got
Understood. I'll aim to get it as close as possible to that number and outline tradeoffs clearly. Appreciate your patience, Emily. Best, Bruce On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:47 PM Emily Johnson <emily
Let's just pause for now. I'll circle back if leadership is still interested. – Emily On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 3:48 PM Bruce Wayne <bruce.wayne.goatforce@gmail.com> wrote: Understood. I'

summary: The sales representative, Bruce Wayne, followed up on a proposal for Marketing Cloud Lite. The prospect, Emily Johnson, consistently raised objections regarding high pricing, competitive comparisons, a strict budget limit of $90K, and the demand for immediate, out-of-the-box functionality. Despite Bruce's efforts to address these concerns by offering proposal revisions for rapid deployment and price adjustments, Emily ultimately decided to pause the discussion, indicating she would only re-engage if her leadership expressed renewed interest.
